description_en: Founded in 1865, Bel is an international family company whose leadership is built on a unique industrial and manufacturing expertise: cheese portions. Iconic brands - including La Vache quirit (Phô mai Con Bò Cười), Kiri, Mini Babybel, Leerdammer, and Boursin - sold on every continent. The engagement of our employees and innovation are some of our strengths to help us become the most innovative and responsible dairy player.
